edu.bu.segrelab.comets
Class Comets

java.lang.Object
  edu.bu.segrelab.comets.Comets
All Implemented Interfaces:
CometsConstants
public class Comets
extends java.lang.Object
implements CometsConstants

The base class for running the COMETS program. Instantiating this class will build a JFrame with all the necessary components for running the program. //TODO add a couple sentences about the usual program flow. Starts as SETUP_MODE --> SIMULATION_MODE, etc.

Author:
Bill Riehl

Field Detail

DIFFUSION_TEST_MODE

public static boolean DIFFUSION_TEST_MODE
A debugging tool. If this is set to true, then the only running done by each cell just runs through a diffusion routine.

Constructor Detail

Comets

public Comets(java.lang.String loaderClassName)
Creates a new Comets object. This automatically starts the program by creating and populating a frame.

Parameters:
loaderClassName - - The name of the CometsLoader extension class used for loading a COMETS package. For example, the FBA loader is "edu.bu.segrelab.comets.fba.FBACometsLoader".
Method Detail

showIntroDialog

public void showIntroDialog()
Shows an introductory JDialog with a welcome message and a prompt for the user to load initial data: either a layout file, something from the database, or a model file for manipulation in the layout editor.

loadModelFile

public void loadModelFile()
Prompts the user to choose a model file for loading into memory. Uses the current CometsLoader for parsing the file.

getModelNames

public java.lang.String[] getModelNames()
Returns the names of all loaded models.

Returns:
a String array of model names.

getMediaNames

public java.lang.String[] getMediaNames()
Returns the names of all media components in the current world.

Returns:
a String array of nutrient names

getFrame

public javax.swing.JFrame getFrame()
Returns the JFrame that composes this class.

Returns:
the master JFrame for the program

getCells

public java.util.ArrayList getCells()
Returns the set of cells being used in the program.

Returns:
an ArrayList of Cells

getWorld

public World2D getWorld()
Returns the World2D being used in the program.
Note that this will likely be a subclass (FBAWorld, etc), but the abstract type is used here.

Returns:
a World2D or null if it hasn't been instantiated.

getModels

public Model[] getModels()
Returns the array of loaded Models.
These will likely be subclasses, but the abstract type is used here.

Returns:
an array of Models

getParameters

public CometsParameters getParameters()
Returns the CometsParameters object generated and used by the program. It is intended to be the only such instance of the object used throughout the program's runtime.

Returns:
a CometsParameters

startSimulation

public void startSimulation()
Sets the state of the program into simulation mode and places a simulation pane (CometsRunPane) in the main area of the frame.

endSimulation

public void endSimulation()
Sets the program back in setup mode, placing the setup pane in the program's frame, if necessary.

setWorldSizeDialog

public void setWorldSizeDialog()
Opens a dialog that allows users to set the size of the world in boxes. This should have an immediate effect on the World2D object.

setParametersDialog

public void setParametersDialog()
Spawns a dialog owned by Comets' frame.

This dialog has options for setting a whole bunch of parameters for the simulator. These only apply to the current run - loading a new layout file or from the database may nullify any changes.

loadLayoutDB

public void loadLayoutDB()
Prompts the user to load a simulation layout from the public P-KOMETS database. This is done through a series of menus and loading screens, but calling this method starts the process.

saveLayoutFile

public void saveLayoutFile(boolean saveAs)
Saves the current layout state to a layout file.

Parameters:
saveAs - If false, automatically overwrite the currently loaded file. If true, prompt the user for a new filename.

saveBiomassSnapshot

public void saveBiomassSnapshot()
Writes the biomass level of each species to a file with a given name. Format can be either Matlab matrix (CometsConstants.MATLAB_FORMAT) or COMETS default (CometsConstants.COMETS_FORMAT). Matlab matrix format. A Matlab script file (.m) is written with a number of variables equal to the number of species. Each variable is a matrix with dimensions equal to the size of the current World, and each element equal to the amount of biomass in that space. Looks something like: biomass1 = [xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx xxx]; biomass2 = [yyy yyy yyy yyy yyy yyy yyy yyy yyy]; COMETS format is similar to the log file formats. On each line: ...

setExpansionPackage

public void setExpansionPackage()
Sets what expansion package to use. Currently, there's only FBA, but we should leave in code-stubs for other packages based on the API.

loadLayoutFile

public void loadLayoutFile()
Prompts the user to load a layout file from the disk by spawning a file chooser. If a layout is already loaded, and a simulation is running, the simulation is stopped and the layout information is cleared.

resetSimulation

public void resetSimulation()
Resets the currently running simulation to the initial state it was loaded in, or the most recently saved layout.

aboutDialog

public void aboutDialog()
Makes a modal "About COMETS" dialog.

openBrowserURL

public void openBrowserURL(java.lang.String url)
If the desktop mechanism is supported, then this opens the given URL in the operating system's default web browser

Parameters:
url - - the URL to open.

exitProgram

public void exitProgram()
If there's been any changes, then prompt the user to really exit without saving, then do general cleanup and exit.

hasModelsLoaded

public boolean hasModelsLoaded()
Returns true if there is at least one model loaded.

Returns:

showLayoutToolbar

public void showLayoutToolbar(boolean b)
Shows or hides the toolbar containing layout tools.

Parameters:
b - - if true, show the toolbar, otherwise hide it

showModelInfoFrame

public void showModelInfoFrame(boolean b)
Shows or hides a frame with information on the loaded models, as provided by the Model objects.

Parameters:
b - - if true, show the frame, otherwise hide it

showSpaceInfoFrame

public void showSpaceInfoFrame(boolean b)
Shows or hides a JFrame containing information on a given space (grid square), as provided by the World2D object.

Parameters:
b - - If true, show the frame, otherwise hide it.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
The standard main function. Running this will initialize the main COMETS frame and associated components.

Parameters:
args - irrelevant in this case
